artist: Painter: After Domenichino; Delineator: Villain; Lithographer: Nicholas Eustache Maurin
description: portrait of artist facing left looking right; has short dark curly hair, goatee and moustache; cloak over his shoulder; wearing jacket with three buttons and white collar
inscription:
Inscription

on sheet in black: [Lith de Villain/LE DOMINIQUIN/ d\'après son portrait peint par lui-méme]; on image a signature in black: [Ma....s]; on sheet in pencil: [1-356]
title: Le Dominiquin
